definition: Qiandao Lake in Zhejiang, aka Xin'an River Reservoir, created as part of a large hydroelectric project in 1959
thousand
island/CL:個|个[ge4],座[zuo4]
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]

sentences.english: Qiandao Lake from Hangzhou urban district 129kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 千島湖距離杭州市區129公里。

sentences.english: Without this dam, Qiandao Lake wouldn't exist.
sentences.chinese: 沒有這座大壩就沒有千島湖。

sentences.english: Is it that the Xin'an River Reservoir is the very Qiandao Lake?
sentences.chinese: 莫非我們眼前的這座新安江水庫就是千島湖？

sentences.english: Supply ship Qiandaohu docks at Gulf of Aden.
sentences.chinese: 千島湖補給艦停靠亞丁灣。

sentences.english: The visibility in this area is up to 12 meters deep in sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 天氣晴朗時分，千島湖湖水的能見度可達到12米。

sentences.english: We are now at the Kaiyuan Holiday Resort by the side of Qiandao Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在是在千島湖開元度假村。
